note:
Why you might want to follow me: I'm a mixed-race and queer woman who immigrated to the US when I was a child, so I fully embrace diversity and all the complexities of it. I also love art and stories, and am trying to become a better artist myself.

Why you might not want to follow me: I am very cognizant of all the bigotry inherent in American history and culture, and I'm not afraid to criticize myself or others for our biased views.
